short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dedicated assistant extension for Pixels gamers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸŒ³ Pixels Game Assistant (PGA)ğŸŒ³

PGA is a browser extension that helps Pixels gamers play more efficiently and have more fun. PGA dramatically improves many of the frustrations of playing Pixels game, making them much easier to play and helping you achieve the most in the least amount of time without using a bot.


ğŸŒ³ What features are available?

This is a Preview Beta Version that supports only the following limited features.

â­• Sell Order Helper - When you create a new sell order, it shows the current sell order list and displays the floor price and maximum quantity on the form. 
â­• Manual Timer - You can set timers for various tasks such as VIP lounge, Grumpkin watering, and other custom timers.
â­•Task Board List - You can see the last task board list anywhere.
â­•Storage List: the item lists of your storages including ones in Speck or Farm lands
â­•Guild Integration - Guild lands info
â­•Intelligent Market Data - Energy efficiency and production cost analysis



ğŸŒ³ The upcoming full version will support many new awesome features.

âº Global State Industries Tracking - Tree, Grill, Windmill Waiting List
âº Land Search by Industries
âº Guild Integration - Guild-only chatting, Discord integration, members' activity tracking, guild tasks
âº Suggest a Daily To-do List - Based on your levels
âº Many more advanced features based on the upcoming Pixels' major updates


ğŸŒ³ PGA is free to use?

This preview version is completely free of charge. The upcoming full version may have some premium features requiring paid subscription, and some advanced guild features are available only for participating guild members. However, even without any paid subscription, all Pixels gamers will find this utility a must to have for enjoying the Pixels game more.

ğŸ’¥PGA does not submit any actions to the Pixels game by itself. It only utilizes and display the game data  more user-friendly that are already available inside the game.

ğŸ’¥ After installation, make sure to pin the extension in the top right corner for quick and easy access.

ğŸ”¹ Keyboard shortcuts
ğŸªŸ Windows OS : Alt +
ğŸ Mac OS : Option +
	x -> Home
	c -> Tasks
	v -> Timer
	b -> Storage
	n -> Note
	m -> Guild
	 ,  -> Market

v 0.7.2
ğŸ§¿ Release note ğŸ§¿

ğŸ¯ New features

ğŸ“Œ Three big updates
ğŸ”¹New intelligent storage management
- The Storage tab can self-detect items in chests.
- Show the Storage QuickView by simply hovering over a chest
- Chests will blink and show the number of an item being held when you hover over a light blue item in the Tasks tab.
- Chests will blink and show the number of an item being held when you hover over it in the Storage tab.
- Support for the traditional storage features as well.

ğŸ”¹Major timer updates
- Self-detect and start timers for farming, crafting, energy recharging, and more.
- Display desktop notifications for each completion.
- Enjoy efficient energy recharging with the help of the Energy section.

ğŸ”¹New Shopping List tab
- Add items to the tab from the Tasks and Market tabs by clicking on the shopping basket.
- Add items to the tab from the Storage tab and in-game recipe books by shift-clicking on an item.
- Look up an item and add it to the tab by clicking on it.
- Buy the items at the in-game buy desk using the convenient two-step smart copy-and-paste of item name and quantity, a.k.a. smart item buy helper.

ğŸ·ï¸ Enhancements
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
